column2: }}'''Quest for Mordor''' is a game made by someone who calls himself ''Morgoth''.<ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/qfm.html Quest For Mordor] at Tolkien Games (retrieved at 12 August 2010)</ref><ref name="UTM">[http://hobbitstuff.tripod.com/qfm.htm Quest For Mordor] at Beneath the Mountain (retrieved at 12 August 2010)</ref> The player finds an [[Rings of Power
column3: Elven Ring]] at an island near [[Mordor]], and has to use it against [[Morgoth]].<ref name="UTM"/> It was designed with [[Klik & Play]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/><ref>[http://tieba.baidu.com/f?kz=177120564 Baidu, 托尔金相关游戏简介] (retrieved 2 May 2011)</ref>
